items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 15)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 16!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 65 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 14!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 60 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 13! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 155 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 32!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 115 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 24!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 65 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 14!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 175 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 36.
